segments.text: I ’ m looking forward to relaxing this coming weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope that I can finally find free time too . I ’ Ve been so busy at work recently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How might you spend the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope to do a little gardening . I find it very relaxing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I might do that too . I hope the weather is nice . I could go and play some golf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard that the weather should be good . There ’ s a possibility of a shower , but it ’ s not very likely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hopefully , we ’ ll both have relaxing weekends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , something could come up and stop that wish coming true .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , there ’ s always the possibility of some urgent work requiring our attention .
segments.speaker: S1
